[DQC.IFRS.0129.9607] It is expected that NoncontrollingInterests with a value of 181,537,000 reported in the network role http://polarismedia.com/xbrl/2021/roles/Table1StatementOfFinancialPositionPlaceholderThisItemMUSTBeUsedAsAStartingPointForTheStatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 198,703,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://polarismedia.com/xbrl/2021/roles/Table1StatementOfChangesInEquityPlaceholderThisItemMUSTBeUsedAsAStartingPointForTheStatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
